topic.title: The recent development on ZeroTalk
topic.body:
When i look around i see nothing but

- Semi-Professional intellectuals playing masturbation games
- Wannabee Snoop-Dogg-class-clowns trying to be eloquent
- Rich dudes constantly bragging about being wealthy
- Arrogant developers bashing a rookie

1566891933_16wy1B4fK7XdsaZPBsQkxcnUzrcMy.body:
> [iloveguac](#comment_8_1A2bJUxDcvDbsZ1ttC1fSgy6J74ghfmpxU): I think you're the retarded one. You do realize that there are millions if not billions of people that are well educated, wealthy, and own precious metals. That information literally tells you nothing about numismatist.

It most likely doesn't tell anything to almost anyone. But it might tell something to someone ?! Are you quite sure that you are 100% anonymous?!

Constantly bragging about being wealthy and owning metals on a platform ZeroNet is indeed retarded.

I wanna see your faces when your wife files for divorce right after paying off 300k of your loan.
Being independent is always better.

> [bigbadbob](#comment_433_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): buying a house is great if you can manage it,  buying several could be a decent income if you could keep them full of renters.  I don't think you would pay taxes on that income either:)

renters can easily become a headache too :)

> [bigbadbob](#comment_435_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): oh yea,  not for everyone.  Being a handy bastard able to fix damage would be a big plus.  Having to pay others would not be ideal.  With good renters and some luck i've seen this work well for some.  Good retirement plan

I don't care about retirement planning because i don't know if i make it to retirement :)

> [bigbadbob](#comment_437_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): But what if you do? lol

LOL then i will still have enough income to survive :)

> [bigbadbob](#comment_439_1CLhLYdMKjXtium9yjuRkSnFvPfdoUTXAj): Some people just won't retire,  I know a cement finisher guy who is like 80.  One day he will just  drop dead into a slab I'm sure.

if he is passionate about what he does, why not

1567063520_18CNiJ2fa4qWU3mqbmE5kndxLk15o.body:
> [holeyhouseofair](#comment_75_1CHaf5xV3RY8BaoknhfQBNKAYycPwjjc57): I'm actually only a hobbyist intellectual, It can be a bit overbearing sometimes, playing with reality is fun.

Free thinkers became quiet here. There were many of them and they used to post interesting stuff.
